text: Then the 20:19 chief priests and the scribes ¦ scribes and the chief priests CTchief priests and the scribes wanted to arrest him at that very hour, for they knew he 20:19 had spoken this parable ¦ was speaking these parables ANThad spoken this parable against them, but they were 20:19 afraid ¦ afraid of the people ANT CT TRafraid.
